# Verify that unity exits with an appropriate error when
# asked to use a semver version that resolves via multiple
# URLs

# Initial setup
git init
git add -A
git commit -m 'Initial commit'

# Test
! unity test v0.3.0-beta.5
stderr 'failed to pre-resolve versions \[v0\.3\.0-beta\.5\]: failed to resolve "v0\.3\.0-beta\.5" to a single successful response'

-- cue.mod/module.cue --
module: "mod.com"

-- cue.mod/tests/tests.cue --
package tests

Versions: ["v0.3.0-alpha6"]
